hypothesis.statement: Temporal integration of immunity over infection history will improve accuracy from 61% to 84%
hypothesis.null_hypothesis: Time-integrated immunity provides no additional information beyond point-in-time immunity
hypothesis.alternative_hypothesis: Accumulated immunity from past 600 days predicts variant fitness better than current immunity alone
hypothesis.scientific_basis: VASIL paper equation: E[Immune_y(t)] = Σ_x ∫ π_x(s)·I(s)·P_neut(t-s,x,y) ds

integrity_audit.details: Legacy VASIL coefficients found but not used in temporal model

optimization_required.proposed_solution: Pre-compute 200×200 variant matrix with PK decay curves
